content:
SearchCredentials Constructor

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Search
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll

In this Article

Initializes a new instance of the SearchCredentials class with a query key or an admin key. Use a query key if your application does not require write access to the Search Service or index.

public SearchCredentials (string apiKey);
Parameters
apiKey
String

api-key used to authenticate to the Azure Search service.

Remarks

If your application performs only query operations on an index, we recommend passing a query key for the parameter. This ensures that you have read-only access to the index, which is consistent with the principle of least privilege.
